text_block_list.text: The following morning as I sorted through paperwork…

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, horrible news!! We can't find Curren Chan-san anywhere…
Rumours of Curren Chan's dissappearance quickly spread amongst the students.
Apparently she left a note in her room. After receiving it from Tazuna-san I opened it.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I'm going to go on a trip to better myself. I plan on meeting with the legendary Uma Sage in the mountains.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Onee-chan, please don't be mad at me. You see, my dream is to one day…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Onee-chan, please don't be mad at me. You see, my dream is to one day…
The letter ended abruptly.
The phrase "legendary Uma Sage" confused me, so I decided to see if there were any hints left behind on her Umastagram.
There was a picture that was posted a few seconds ago. It was a selfie of Curren looking dejected while on the way to a remote island. Underneath the picture was…
#AStoneInACreek #UnableToEscapeTheTorrent #ItCan'tHelpButSink
A mysterious haiku… It seemed to center around the word "creek". An intricately written haiku about one's downfall hidden amongst hashtags.
What am I doing! I have to go after her! I should bring "that" with me too…!
There was no sign of human life on the remote island. Is Curren Chan really here…?
As I wandered deeper into the mountains in search of Curren Chan I heard the sound of a raging waterfall. Then…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Pain… Only… Helps… To… Further… One's… Progress… On… The… Path… Towards… Self… Betterment…
Curren Chan was reciting something that sounded like it came out of Buddhist scriptures while sitting under a waterfall…!? Regardless, I rushed over and pulled her out…!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, you found me… I guess you really are the best at finding me when I'm lost, huh, Onee-chan?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, you found me… I guess you really are the best at finding me when I'm lost, huh, Onee-chan?
I knew she left clues on her Umasta post so that I'd be able to find her.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Okay, that's fine. But what about?
choice_data_list: I want to learn more about you.
I want to learn more about you.

text_block_list.text: The reason I wanted to learn more about her is because as of now I know nothing. After I said this Curren Chan smiled at me.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Onee-chan, you really want to know the reason behind my "cuteness," don't you?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Onee-chan, you really want to know the reason behind my "cuteness," don't you?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: But tell me, are you really prepared to learn everything about me?

She looked at me in such a serious manner that I flinched. However, if I can't even meet her gaze, I'm not qualified to be her trainer. However, if I can't even meet her gaze, I'm not qualified to be her trainer.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Hehe… well, guess I've got no choice. Then we'll begin from when I was born.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Babies laugh a lot, right? When I was a newborn I would laugh a lot too.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: And because of that my family would laugh along with me. They would always call me "cute" and looked so happy all of the time.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Onii-san… I mean my real older brother would always tell me that my cuteness had the power to make those around me happy.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: So I decided that I'd live my life being "cute". I decided that when I was… around 3 years old maybe?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: So in order to become as "cute" as possible I decided to do research on "cuteness". As a result of my research, I gained many admirers.

text_block_list.name: Curren's Follower
text_block_list.text: I… Um…! You're the Umastagrammer, Curren, aren't you!?

text_block_list.name: Curren's Follower
text_block_list.text: You gave me the courage to change myself… Curren, you saved me.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: What she said made me so happy… I was able to use my cuteness to make people outside of my family happy too.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I was happy to receive their praise, and they were happy because I was cute.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: So I thought that I would continue to expand this cycle of happiness!
I had no idea that the concept of "cuteness" had such a deep meaning for her.
choice_data_list: So why'd you come to this academy?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: That's because… the Uma Musume from Tracen Academy that I saw on TV shined brighter than anyone else.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: They were drenched in sweat, their hair ruined by the wind, and were always wearing a stoic, unsmiling expression. Honestly, it was a little bit frightening…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: The things I knew, the things I mastered, what I believed cuteness to be… They were the exact opposite. But, but when I saw those girls race…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I thought… they were so "cute". They shined so brightly!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: If I join Tracen Academy and win races… I could shine just like… No! I could shine even brighter than the girls I saw on TV.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: More people would know about me! Not only that, the entire world would fall in love with me!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: But… during the preliminary race I betrayed everyone's faith in me…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: When you're cute you have to be perfect. If you destroy everyone's dreams… you're no longer cute.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I can't believe that I prepared so poorly that my horseshoe ended up falling off. It wasn't cute at all!! It wasn't cute at all!!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: That's why I came here to improve myself! I don't want to continue being this worthless Curren!
I finally figured her out. She's a perfectionist struggling to keep up with her ideal self.
Being cute is not something you can achieve in a single day. From the tips of her nails to each individual hair on her head, her effort to be cute was ever-present.
Her amazing racing ability is no exception. There is no way that she could have gotten this good without working herself to death, even when no one was around.
And all of this… for the sake of "cuteness…"

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Eh? Is that supposed to be a compliment? I feel like you're not really praising me.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: But, I guess it's pretty obvious that I do really hate it… huh?
This was the first time that I saw her not as some alien, but as a true Uma Musume. And that's when I realized that I truly respected her way of life.
As her trainer, there are things I must do. I will help her reach the stage that she yearns for!

With more training she will definitely regain the cuteness that she had lost. In order to do that I handed her back the horseshoe that had come off. In order to do that I handed her back the horseshoe that had come off.
choice_data_list: I found this for you, Princess

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ehehe… Thank you, Onee-chan.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ehehe… Thank you, Onee-chan.
This was the day where I truly became Curren Chan's trainer. And as we trained together the legendary Uma Sage smiled down upon us.
